name: Buckshot Bill Demo
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED FOR EASIER AIMING

As the iconic video game character Buckshot Bill, use the force of your shotgun to launch yourself around obstacles and acquire shekels.

Featuring:

- Buckshot Bill, the voice of a generation

- 15 challenging levels

- "Charming" art style

This is a demo that I might build on and turn into a full game if people enjoy it. If you would like to see a full version or want to leave me feedback, please scream at me on Twitter at https://twitter.com/KonradKahnert.
